posts.name: Burger Bar
posts.note: Burger Bar serves handcrafted hamburgers, fries, and towering milkshakes at a small, old-school walk-up counter. They make their own buns. You should order the elk and/or buffalo burgers. Burger Bar triple fries their french fries.

posts.name: Curry Pizza
posts.note: Curry Pizza has been serving Indian food over 10 years and they came up with a twist of creation of curry sauces for pizzas. They opened their first location in a small town called Bicknell (Southern Utah) and it's called Bhindas Curry Pizza Palace.

posts.name: Oh Mia Restaurant
posts.note: Oh Mia Restaurant is an eclectic spot for banh mi sandwiches along with other Vietnamese favorites, including the Brisket Pho or the beef short rib Banh Mi sandwich with home-made kimchi or the honey glazed pork vermicelli salad or the garlic-butter ribeye steak. NOTE: They have multiple locations.
